pages.text: The Filing Cabinet is the core storage block. It can hold up to 12 Filing Folders and one Index Card.

$(thing)Usage:$()$(br)$(li)Right-click with a folder to insert it$(li)Shift-right-click to open the cabinet GUI$(li)Right-click with a Linked Index Card to link the cabinet to a Filing Index$(li)Compatible with hoppers and other item transport systems

pages.title: Crafting
pages.text: The Filing Cabinet recipe requires iron blocks, iron bars, and Filing Folders.
